data.message:
Eminem = the definition of hip hop artistry, controlling rage with ability. Knowing his hip hop roots and a student of the game.  

Drake = entertainer, bring people together and a vibe creator and a actor. Decent rapper but makes music you want to party to.  

In the end, you can't compare entertainers to true hip hop artists. 2 different calibers of skill and abilities. 

Em > Drake 1 billion times over. Not even Close...

replies.message: Eminem be rapping shiit about his mother and daughter all the time,drake is better bro
Dude you ain't know shit read a book on hip hop educate your self. Coming out here saying drake better. Better at making music for clubs and strippers. In absolutely no way is he better. People smh
